description: Have you ever found a recipe for a 30-minute dish and scoffed "It takes me 20 minutes just to get the ingredients out," or watched a professional chef blaze through a pile of onions in awe? Do you find yourself struggling to get dinner made, only to face a giant pile of dishes and wondering if you could be doing things a little better, or faster? The key to these problems is efficiency. There are a ton of tricks you can learn from the pros about being cleaner and more efficient, which is what will ultimately make you a faster cook at home. We're going to walk you through some of cooking school's greatest tips so you, too, can start learning to make 30-minute recipes that actually take 30 minutes.
name: A Crash Course in Speed | Cooking School
